definition: surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: Sanitation facilities - people are defecating in open spaces.
sentences.chinese: 衛生設備缺乏，人們就在空地上大便。

sentences.english: They have no access to toilets or sanitary facilities.
sentences.chinese: 他們不能上廁所，也沒有其他衛生設備。

sentences.english: We subcontracted  for sanitary-plumbing equipment in the project.
sentences.chinese: 在該項工程中我們分包了衛生設備的承建。

sentences.english: Nor how trees could be trained to grow kitchens and sanitary appliances.
sentences.chinese: 對如何培育樹木以構成廚房及衛生設備也沒有答案。
